page.title: 06Cheriton Fitzpaine Revel
page.content: In alternative Julys there is a {Revel}held at Jack's Acre.It is organised by the{PTA}.The money raised goes to the school.At the Revel there are lots of stalls.The{ducking stool is the most popular,where you have to throw a ball at a target which makes someone fall into a pool.There are lots of smaller games stalls like hoopla where you can win prizes.There is also a greasy pole where you sit on a pole with a sack of straw and hit the opposite person. Sometimes there is a pony which you can ride in a side field.Near the end of the Revel there is a{tug of war}competition.People in the village will make up teams for the revel.There is an ice cream stall and a tea tent. Sometimes in the after- noon there is a fancy dress competit- ion and afterwards there is a parade.
